thread.section_title: Hotel Morgana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Outstanding
thread.title_full: Outstanding - Review of Hotel Morgana, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: 82Drew
title: Outstanding
text:
Wow, what a wonderful hotel.
Just had a couple of nights at the Morgana, and the hotel is fantastic.
The staff were ever so helpful, breakfast was lovely, and the bedroom ... Wow. We had a executive room and was beautifully decorated.
Located 15 minutes walk from the Colosseum, and less than 5 from termini train station.
We will definitely be back.
